body: the viridi section is still top tier
I liked the palutena section but the viridi part was kind of a turn off. Really good job keeping all the characters consistent with their in-game personalities though.
I wish they more hentai comics on Medusa, Palutena, Viridi, Phosphora, and Amazon Pandora with Pit and/or Dark Pit rather than Pit and Dark Pit (guy on guy hentai is creepy)
